properties.displayName: Deploy Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts (AMBA-ALZ) for Integration Services - Part #2
properties.description: This initiative deploys Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts (AMBA-ALZ) to monitor Integration Services such as Cognitive Services (Azure AI), Machine Learning.

metadata.description: Tag name used to disable monitoring at the resource level. Set to true if monitoring should be disabled.
